##Loading and preprocessing the data
Loading the dataset from github repository
```{R}
library(RCurl)
library(ggplot2)

  file_name = "activity.csv"
  setInternet2(use = TRUE)
  url_source = "https://github.com/nata1ia//blob/master/RepData_PeerAssessment1/activity.csv"
  if (!file.exists(file_name)) download.file(url_source, destfile = file_name, method = "auto")

  setClass('myDate')
  setAs("character", "myDate", function(from) as.Date(from, format = "%Y-%m-%d"))

  activity_data<-read.csv(file_name,
                          colClasses = c("numeric", "myDate", "numeric"),
                          header = T)
```
